title: Development of a fluidized bed reactor for phosphorus recovery from rubber industry wastewater through struvite formation: material selection and prototype
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00043A, Paper
Danai Maddewor, Patiya Kemacheevakul, Nipaphan Phungsombun, Pongsavat Savatdipap, Surawut Chuangchote
A fluidized bed reactor for phosphorus (P) recovery from treated rubber industry wastewater through struvite formation was developed.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
